column1: ## set all prices to 1 aside for runes (inclusive)
## change: starting flasks 3+1 = 2+1 (golden seeds no longer work)
## param CharaInitParam: idrange 3000 3299 && prop HpEstMax 3 : HpEstMax: = 1
## set all starting classes to level 1 / 10 in every stat
## replace: Large Smithing Stone: Golden Rune [6] - 2000
## replace: Great Smithing Stone: Golden Rune [10] - 5000
## replace: Ancient Smithing Stone: Hero's Rune [5] - 35000
## replace: Large Somber Stone: Golden Rune [7] - 2500
## replace: Great Somber Stone: Golden Rune [11] - 6250
## replace: Colossal Somber Stones: Golden Rune [13] - 10000
## replace: Ancient Somber Stone: Hero's Rune [5] - 35000
## lower: weight of non-shield weapons to 0
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 65 69 && positive weight: weight: = 0
## lower: equid load for any endurance by 12 (Val0 used to be same as Val1)
